name: Vカツ / V-Katsu
description: Imagine a world where you can get your original avatar very easily. You can make your own avatar anytime you like by using V-Katsu. V-Katsu is an avatar making software that has the richest variety of expressions. There are a lot of data we have prepared for you.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows7 / 8.1 / 10 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 or GTX 1070 or better/ AMD R9 290 or better Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
